level.heading: Delivery of property by former trustee.

level.text: Unless a cotrustee remains in office or the court otherwise orders, and until the trust property is delivered to a successor trustee or other person entitled to it, a trustee who has resigned or been removed has the duties of a trustee and the powers necessary to protect the trust property.

A trustee who has resigned or been removed shall proceed expeditiously to deliver the trust property within the trustee's possession to the cotrustee, successor trustee, or other person entitled to it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-104, see notes following ยง 19-1301.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 707 of the Uniform Trust Code. See 7C, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
